definitions.definition: An executioner responsible for hanging criminals.
Someone responsible for hanging pictures and other artworks in a gallery, museum etc.
A guessing game where one has to guess the word an opponent is thinking of by guessing one letter at a time, and involving the gradual drawing of a stick figure hanging from the gallows .

main_definition: ( countable ) An executioner responsible for hanging criminals.
secondary_definitions: Someone responsible for hanging pictures and other artworks in a gallery, museum etc.

( uncountable , games ) A guessing game where one has to guess the word an opponent is thinking of by guessing one letter at a time, and involving the gradual drawing of a stick figure hanging from the gallows .
